name: Switch
description: Switch component for toggling boolean value related to some context

props.name: value
props.description: The value of the switch. If true the switch will be turned on. Default value is false

props.name: onValueChange
props.description: Invoked with the new value when the value changes

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether the switch should be disabled

props.name: onColor
props.description: The Switch background color when it's turned on

props.name: offColor
props.description: The Switch background color when it's turned off

props.name: disabledColor
props.description: The Switch background color when it's disabled
